alert.note: Alert for North Slopes of the Western Alaska Range; Upper Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 12 at 6:21AM AKST until November 13 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...North Slopes of the Western Alaska Range and Upper Kuskokwim Valley. * WHEN...From 6 PM Sunday to 9 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: North Slopes of the Western Alaska Range; Upper Kuskokwim Valley
